text:
Ah I understand, so changing the cell from
```begin
	import Pkg
	Pkg.activate(mktempdir())
	
	Pkg.add(["WGLMakie", "JSServe", "AbstractPlotting"])
	
	using JSServe
	Page(exportable = true, offline = true)

	using WGLMakie, AbstractPlotting
	AbstractPlotting.inline!(true)
end```
to
```begin
	import Pkg
	Pkg.activate(mktempdir())
	
	Pkg.add(["WGLMakie", "JSServe", "AbstractPlotting"])
	
	using WGLMakie, AbstractPlotting
	AbstractPlotting.inline!(true)
	
	using JSServe
	Page(exportable = true, offline = true)
end```
fixed the issue!

elements.text: Ah I understand, so changing the cell from

begin
	import Pkg
	Pkg.activate(mktempdir())
	
	Pkg.add(["WGLMakie", "JSServe", "AbstractPlotting"])
	
	using JSServe
	Page(exportable = true, offline = true)

	using WGLMakie, AbstractPlotting
	AbstractPlotting.inline!(true)
end

begin
	import Pkg
	Pkg.activate(mktempdir())
	
	Pkg.add(["WGLMakie", "JSServe", "AbstractPlotting"])
	
	using WGLMakie, AbstractPlotting
	AbstractPlotting.inline!(true)
	
	using JSServe
	Page(exportable = true, offline = true)
end
